name: shai-hulud-remediation
description: Guided remediation workflow for Shai-Hulud 2.0. Helps with credential rotation, cleaning infected packages, and system recovery.

tools.name: rotate_credentials
tools.description: Guides the user through rotating compromised credentials

service.description: Service to rotate credentials for (e.g., github, npm)

tools.name: clean_packages
tools.description: Removes infected packages and reinstalls clean versions

tools.name: verify_cleanup
tools.description: Verifies that the system is clean after remediation steps

instruction: If detection was positive, proceed with remediation. Ask the user which credentials need rotation. Clean any identified infected packages. Finally, run the verification tool to ensure the system is clean.
